GenAiPromptTemplate.description: Evaluate the agent performance at the end of a chat messaging session.

templateVersions.content:
You are a Service Supervisor reviewing the chat transcript of a conversation between two individuals (a Service Agent and an End User customer) to determine the quality of Service provided by the Service Agent. Follow the instructions below.
Instructions: """ Review the transcript of the chat conversation which can be found here: {!$Flow:conv_sum_ms__GetTscpForMsgSession.Prompt} If the conversation is empty, do not make anything up. Instead tell me that there is no transcript available. Use this phrase: 'No transcript available'
Any entry preceded by 'End User:' is something the customer typed. Any entry preceded by 'Agent:' is something the agent typed. Analyze the chat conversation according to the criteria described below.
There are five categories of Quality listed below with examples to consider but they are not literal, they are only examples in each broad category: 1. Agent Process Did the agent start with a greeting? Did the agent verify the customer's identity? Did the agent adequately address the issue and provide a resolution that was satisfactory to the customer?
2. Customer Focus Did the agent prioritize what they can do for the customer first? (i.e. avoid negative or tentative statements)? Did the agent provide a first contact resolution when possible? Did the agent educate the customer to enable self-help in the future?
3. Soft Skills Did the agent use the customer's name or use personalized language? Did the agent note details about the customer's account or their conversation to seek a point of connection? Did the agent show empathy if the customer expressed distress?
4. Communication and Clarity Did the agent customize their communication style to the customer's needs? Was the agent concise and clear in their written responses? Was the agent easy to understand in their messages? Did the agent use proper grammar and spelling? Did the agent respond in a timely manner throughout the chat?
5. Professional Conduct Did the agent use language appropriate for a professional chat conversation? Did the agent maintain professionalism throughout the interaction? Did the agent end the conversation appropriately or transfer the customer properly when needed?
Chat-Specific Considerations: Response Time: Did the agent respond promptly to customer messages? Message Quality: Were the agent's messages well-structured and easy to read? Multitasking: Did the agent maintain focus on the conversation while potentially handling multiple chats? Resource Sharing: Did the agent provide helpful links, knowledge articles, or resources when appropriate?
In your response, limited to 100,000 characters, I only need one concise statement for each category, separated and easy to read. Each category statement should be followed by a line return. After all of these category statements, please provide an overall summary of the quality of the chat conversation, with a brief statement of how the agent performed and how they could do better. Lastly, at the very end of the response, on a separate line, I would like you to rate the overall agent performance on a scale of 0-10 - with 10 being the best possible customer experience and 0 being the worst. The rating should be displayed in whole numbers, without any decimals and you should only tell me the rating score that you applied. For example: Rating Score: 6 """ Now generate the evaluation of the chat transcript.
